TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You go to McDonalds and order a Happy Meal.

I wish for a GNK Power Droid (AKA Gonk Droid).

Edited July 28, 2023 by TwoCalories
Oh look, new page.

Granted but it self destructs. 
 

i wish for a nice pickle.

133507282023

Granted: You find yourself a rare, nice pickle, and become fast friends, unfortunately the rest of the pickles relatives are evil, they set out to ruin your life.

I wish that Spiderman was allowed to be happy.

Granted, he never became spider-man

i wish elon musk would stop hurting earth

005307292023

Granted: He buys Twitter and starts hurting people instead.

I wish to hear a climate change denier explain away what is happening this year.

Granted. A warm, relatively rainy summer. A rain twice per week or more often, the temperature still has not exceeded +31°C.

I wish for rain every two days.

Granted: It lasts fo 2 seconds each time.

I wish I didn't forget what I wanted to wish for.

Granted, you remember you wanted to wish to remember to wish for remembering your wish.

i wish to have something tasty to eat.

224807292023

Granted. You eat it all with great pleasure. But you find out that you were poisoned and you die.

I wish I had a lot of unusual cosmetics in TF2

I know nothing about TF2 except for the memes, but here I go...

Granted, and you join a match to show off your knew cosmetics... *Meet the Sniper theme song plays*

I wish to be a Clone Trooper Specialist in Battlefront 2.

Edited July 30, 2023 by TwoCalories

Granted. You never see the light of day as servers get shut down the day before.

i wish to see a sea that saw a saw that watched a watch

135007302023

Granted. The sea you saw breaks your watch and rusts your saw.

I wish that any Star Wars thing I create gets its own show.

Granted but kathleen kennedy takes complete control and ruins it the same way she did with book of boba fett and undoing the entire point of getting grogu to luke then utterly flushing mando season 3 down the sewer.

i wish kathleen kennedy would stop interfering with and ruining star wars… im looking at you sequel trilogy, mando season 3 and book of boba fett.

155607302023

Edited July 30, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Granted. George Lucas is coming back to direct another 12 movies.

I wish star wars made sense.

Granted. Now everything around has as much sense as SW.

I wish SW was white-and-black.

Granted it goes grey scale.

i wish the kurgan was the winner

115407312023

Granted. You have cut off the last ten minutes of Highlander.

I wish it had a sequel: Lowlander.

Granted. Low lander! A lander in KSP with the landing legs arranged so the lander is low to the ground, AKA land.

I wish for an official NASA concept of a Lunar colony.

Granted. The concept becomes official but after ~1 hour it gets denied.

I wish I got a supercomputer for KSP1

Granted, but the load time is still 30 minutes.

I wish NASA uses centrifuges on their Mars Transfer Vehicle to generate gravity.

Granted, but they fling everyone

i wish that kerbin had cities

Granted, and they pollute Kerbin so much that the sky is no longer blue.

I wish for a sci-fi themed Kerbal battleship.

(I am going to assume you mean like the movie Battleship based off the game for my corruption purposes)

Granted! The remake the movie Battleship and replace the aliens and their tech with kerbals and kerbal tech. Instead of being an action/drama/horror flick it becomes an action/drama/comedy and earns a sequel.

172808012023

where wish? im gonna assume you want a  bagel

granted! but you need to supply the ingredients

 

i want a cookie that is unlimited, i always have cookie

Granted. Its a raisin and prune cookie.

before i wish: i derped earlier and forgot to wish, id say the substitute wish works! Nicely done!

now, i wish for an onion bagel with philadelphia cream cheese

233008012023
